results.description: Leeds wing Ash Handley is called up to the Great Britain squad for their final tour game in Papua New Guinea.
results.shortTitle: Leeds wing Handley gets GB call-up
results.title: Ash Handley: Great Britain call up Leeds wing for final tour match

results.description: Championship side Featherstone Rovers sign former England and Leeds Rhinos back-rower Brett Ferres on a one-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Back-rower Ferres joins Featherstone
results.title: Brett Ferres: Featherstone sign former Leeds Rhinos back-rower

results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.
results.shortTitle: Saints start 2020 season against Salford
results.title: Super League 2020 fixtures: St Helens start v Salford, Toronto open v Castleford

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Leeds Rhinos prop Nathaniel Peteru is to leave the club by mutual consent, with a year left on his contract.
results.shortTitle: Leeds prop Peteru released from contract
results.title: Nathaniel Peteru: Leeds Rhinos prop released from contract

thumbnail.altText: Nathaniel Peteru runs with the ball

results.description: Leeds Rhinos captain Trent Merrin will return for the 2020 season after being allowed to try and find an Australian side.
results.shortTitle: Merrin will stay at Leeds Rhinos
results.title: Trent Merrin: Leeds Rhinos captain to stay at club

results.description: Leeds Rhinos are fined £20,000 - half of it suspended for two years - following salary cap breaches in 2018.
results.shortTitle: Leeds to pay £10,000 salary cap fine
results.title: Leeds Rhinos: Super League club to pay five-figure fine for salary cap breaches

thumbnail.altText: Leeds Rhinos chief executive Gary Hetherington.

results.description: Hull KR sign Leeds Rhinos hooker Matt Parcell on a one-year deal after a spell with Rovers on loan.
results.shortTitle: Hull KR sign Leeds hooker Parcell
results.title: Matt Parcell: Hull KR sign Leeds Rhinos hooker on one-year contract

results.description: Huddersfield Giants sign Leeds Rhinos full-back Ashton Golding on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield sign full-back Golding
results.title: Ashton Golding: Huddersfield Giants sign Leeds Rhinos full-back

results.description: Salford Red Devils half-back Jackson Hastings wins the 2019 Steve Prescott Man of Steel award.
results.shortTitle: Salford's Hastings wins 2019 Man of Steel
results.title: Jackson Hastings: Salford Red Devils half-back wins 2019 Steve Prescott Man of Steel award

results.description: England half-back Luke Gale says his late mother would be proud of him joining Leeds Rhinos after years driving him there when he was an academy player.
results.shortTitle: 'Mum would be proud of Leeds move' - Gale
results.title: Luke Gale: 'Mum would be proud of Leeds Rhinos move'

results.description: England half-back Luke Gale joins Leeds Rhinos from Castleford Tigers on a three-year deal for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Leeds Rhinos sign England half-back Gale
results.title: Luke Gale: Leeds Rhinos sign Castleford Tigers & England half-back

results.description: Five players from League Leaders' Shield winners St Helens are named in Super League's Dream Team for the 2019 season.

results.title: Super League Dream Team: St Helens quintet included in 2019 line-up

results.description: Leeds end their season with a victory over Warrington, who are pipped to third place by Salford.
results.shortTitle: Wire finish fourth after losing to Leeds
results.title: Super League: Leeds Rhinos 26-4 Warrington Wolves - Wire drop to fourth with defeat

results.description: Leeds Rhinos forward James Donaldson signs a new two-year deal with the Super League side.
results.shortTitle: Donaldson extends Leeds contract
results.title: James Donaldson: Leeds Rhinos forward signs new contract

results.description: London Broncos lose at Wakefield and are relegated from Super League - relive the action from Friday's five games.
results.shortTitle: London relegated from Super League - the action as it happened
results.title: Super League live: London Broncos relegated - the action as it happened

results.description: St Helens's Matty Lees, whose season was ended because of a perforated bowel, is among five shortlisted for the Super League Young Player of the Year award.
results.shortTitle: Five shortlisted for Young player award

results.description: Leeds Rhinos appoint interim boss Richard Agar as their head coach on a rolling 12-month contract.
results.shortTitle: Agar named Leeds head coach for 2020

results.description: Salford win a seventh game in a row for the first time since 1975-76 to beat Leeds and boost their play-off hopes.
